text:
[Verse]
Neon lights we dance all night
Moon above shining bright
Feel the beat lose control
Under stars we find our soul

[Verse 2]
City streets echo our feet
Laugh and twirl to a new beat
Eyes are closed hearts are free
In this moment you and me

[Chorus]
Dancing dancing under stars
Forget the world forget the scars
Music lifts us all so high
Touch the heavens touch the sky

[Verse 3]
Midnight breeze through our hair
Every step without a care
Spinning round in the glow
Love and joy start to flow

[Bridge]
Hearts align like constellations
Feel the magic in vibrations
In this dance we come alive
No need for words just the vibe

[Chorus]
Dancing dancing under stars
Forget the world forget the scars
Music lifts us all so high
Touch the heavens touch the sky
title: Dancing Under Stars
